tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE procurement_evaluation (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    overall_performance INT,
    comments TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (vendor_id) REFERENCES vendor_performance_metrics(id)
);

CREATE TABLE product_metrics (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    vendor_id INT,
    performance_rating FLOAT,
    sales_volume INT
);
